None.Name: Flamethrower
None.Description: Unit casts raging flames that deal 120 damage to units every second.

None.Name: Conflagrate
None.Description: Activate to fill a cone-shaped area with devestating flames that deal 210 damage to enemies every second. Lasts for 20 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
